statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.39}+{8.55}\right)}={29.88}\approx{29.88}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.55}\cdot{6.37}={54.4635}\approx{54.5}.
